mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, lat, lng, address, place_type, image_url, thumbnail_url FROM places WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO places (name, description, lat, lng, address, place_type, image_url, thumbnail_url) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{address}, #{placeType}, #{imageUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl})
